column5: Today I bumped my power steering box of a rock.  It,s leaking abit on the bottom.I was told the seal broke.It,s will be ok til I get it in for fix,en on Monday.  My question is,is it a ford order product only?  Thanks Brian
Go to the bone yard and get one.You may have cracked it,but looks like the seal is leaking. I know quite a few people that have hit them,myself twice and every time they were cracked.

No crack Paul. I looked myself.It,s coming right from the seal.Must of bunked it right on the bolt and jammed it up.I did phone the boneyard, but there seems to be a lack of ford parts.Something about "built tough",if you dont abuse them.  This maybe my last fixs for the ole girl.I just cant bring myself to having payments for a new one.Buying used is just crazy.They want just as much almost.
Oh yeah. It's a Ford. Couldn't get going fast enough to hit it that hard. I grazed a rock.

your better off getting a reman steering box from a supplier. Barton auto supply and hamilton auto supply have decent prices! Ive changed plenty of them, esp fords! And theres possibly more damage done to it than just a seal! Esp if your alignments out of whack!
Alignment is fine. No pulling to either side.  Thanks vinnimon.
Interesting......what was your first comment to me this morning about my GMC?????  :whistling:    :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  Sorry...couldn't resist....lol
